Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for placing your Patent order with LegalZoom.
We are ready to prepare your provisional patent application and your technical illustrations. In order to help us with the drawings, we need to know if there is anything specific that you would like them to convey.
Please send an email to patents@legalzoom.com and let us know what you would like the drawing to convey, and whether there is any specific elements you would like included.
Please also send a sketch of your invention by email to patents@legalzoom.com. Photographs and images are generally not acceptable. You can also send it by fax (323-389-0539) or by mail to:
LegalZoom ? Attn: Patents 7083 Hollywood Blvd., Suite 180 Los Angeles, CA 90028 Re: Order Number: |#|
Be sure to reference your order number.
After we receive your information, we will prepare a draft illustration in 7 - 10 business days for your approval. If acceptable, we will then file your completed provisional patent application with the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office.
If you have any questions, please call us toll-free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone} {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Patent Team
